snippet: The acquisition would expand the British grocery store chain’s online business and make it less reliant on food sales.
abstract: DealBook Online; British grocery store chain J Sainsbury will buy Home Retail Group for 1.3 billion pounds, or $1.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: The acquisition would expand the British grocery store chain’s online business and make it less reliant on food sales.

headline.main: J Sainsbury Agrees to Offer $1.9 Billion for Home Retail Group, Owner of Argos
